features: Stylish (black) stainless steel finish, compact size: 0.7 cubic-foot capacity, 1050 watts and 11 power levels
Mute function, settings, clock, kitchen timer, child safety lock, easy auto-cook functions: Popcorn, potato, pizza, frozen veggie, beverage, reheat
One touch express cooking function with 1-6 minutes and plus30 seconds functions, and two defrost settings (by weight or by time)

Bright digital display, easy-to-read control panel, interior light and 10 inch glass turntable

body.description: This COMFEE' 0.7 Cubic foot 700 watt microwave oven features convenient one Touch cooking, 11 power levels, mute button, and removable turntable in a compact footprint to fit in a cabinet or on the counter. The large LED digital display has a clock function and can also display a kitchen timer as well as the cooking time remaining. Includes an energy saving eco mode where the LED display can be turned off. A convenient mute button turns off the microwave beeps for quiet operation. Its smaller size is ideal for apartment kitchens, vacation homes, offices or dorms.；The product voltage arrange is 110V

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Its smaller size is ideal for apartment kitchens, vacation homes, offices or dorms. COMFEE' is a trusted brand in small kitchen appliances. As a professional manufacturer of small appliances, we are committed to building better products that add convenience, and enhanced experiences for a value-driven customer. COMFEE' 700 Watt Microwave Fully-Featured Compact Countertop Microwave Turn off all the microwave beeps by pressing the sound on/off button. One touch cooking for six common foods. LED digital control panel with interior light. 700 Watts 11 Power settings. Removable 10-inch glass turntable. 0.7 Cubic foot capacity. Compact size: 17.3” x 13” x 10.2” (W*D*H) Internal dimensions: 12.05” x 11.97” x 8.11” (W*D*H)

Thoughtful Features This microwave has many user-friendly features. Turn off all the microwave beeps by pressing the sound on/off button. Child safety lock keeps the microwave away from curious hands. To prevent children or others from using the microwave, use the lock function. Easy One-Touch Buttons Enjoy one touch cooking for six of the most popular microwaved foods. Press the desired pre-programmed button and the microwave automatically starts. Easily make popcorn, potato, pizza, frozen vegetables, or reheat a beverage or dinner plate. Express Cooking The large LED digital display has a clock function and can also display a kitchen timer as well as the cooking time remaining. The microwave can be turned on for one to six minutes at 100 percent power by simply touching the number of minutes you would like to cook. Multiple Cooking Options Conveniently defrost, cook or reheat foods with this fully featured compact microwave. Cooking options include one touch express cooking for up to six minutes, pre-programmed cooking for common foods, and time/power level cooking. Frozen foods can be defrosted by time or weight, depending on your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute! Effective!
reviews.reviewText: Who's ever heard of Comfee before? I'm used to buying from Black & Decker, Panasonic, Toshiba - you know, the usual suspects. But look at the style of this thing. This is what appliances *should* look like, elevate your space! I had the same hesitations as most looking at this probably do:(1) I've never heard of this brand before, it's going to melt and light my building on fire(2) The interface is going to be counter intuitive and impossible to useTo address (1) - the internals of most microwaves are almost identical. I've had zero issues so far. It heats up my food great, and I've noticed no time difference, no dead spots, honestly very little difference compared to other microwaves I've owned/used in the pastTo address (2) - yes the interface *is* a little clunky. But honestly a few minutes with the instruction manual and it's not all that bad. The dial is a little tricky when setting cook time - you turn it one direction first, then turn it back to get it down to the right range (you'll see what I mean) - but I'm almost always using the 30 second button anyway. Also it has the mute setting as a dedicated button which is huge!In terms of size the 0.9 cubic ft SKU fits perfectly in my small kitchen and has plenty of space inside to fit plates and larger tupperware. 0.7 seemed way too small (also in terms of power) so if you have the space for the 0.9 one I'd recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 700 Watt Comfee Microwave
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfect for the limited space I have. Inside is a little smaller than some 700 watts I've had in the past, however it does still fit a dinner plate. If popping popcorn, until the bag starts to inflate, it stays stationary on the turning plate as the bags are too long for turning. Once inflated it does rotate. It's best to put a silicone mat underneath as it does slide slightly when opening the door handle. Easy to clean. The few quirks are no big deal. It cooks as it's intended for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars simplistic and small footprint
reviews.reviewText: I got it on a special deal of the day only paying about $84 for it so I can't complain about the price. It works fine but at 700W I always have to add time for cooking directions as most frozen dishes, or other items are based on using a 1200W Microwave. I don't have to add a lot of time, but say if it says 4 minutes, I leave it in for five etc. It does require more space than you'd think, so be sure you check the specs for safety, one side they ask for a 4 feet clearance, not sure why, I gave it two and it seems to work without any issues. You'll also have to remember NOT to put things on top of it (you should have about a 10" clearance above it, and at least 3 to 4" behind it. That worked okay on my counter. I have a very limited income so when my old Sylvania died (after giving me some 23 or so good years), another 700W, I had to find an inexpensive replacement and this was it.There is something that I find annoying. When I want to set it to a certain time, I'm so accustomed to just pressing 150 for 1 minute 50 seconds... but if you try that with this machine, as soon as you hit the one, it will begin a one minute timing no more no less, and you'll have to stop it, and go the longer way. You must push the timer button up top first, when four 0's appear, THEN you can enter you 150, or 430, or whatever not an even minute timing you wish.It has a nice glass revolving tray inside. I use covers for all of my dishes because microwaved items give off a lot of water vapor since it is the water molecules it stimulates. This is what eventually killed my old machine. I didn't realize all that moisture was just sitting on top of the inside of my microwave and eventually it rusted. (Yes, of course I regularly cleaned my microwave; but since it rarely got dirty or showed spillage, there might be a week or more before I'd wipe it down. Now I know that by having fairly inexpensive plastic covers (1 large and one small) they will trap most of the steam on them, and a quick wipe across the top of the inside, should keep it from eating away at the metal surface. Anyway, it's a good buy for the price, it works well. It doesn't have all the bells and whistles of the MUCH higher priced microwaves--but it does do the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice little microwave, save me lots of space. The power is a bit weak, needs to double the heating time. The only problem to me is that it is so small that couldn’t fit in the Costco rotisserie chicken. If its inner space is 2 inches bigger then would be perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This item was just right for a small space. I don't like a cluttered countertop. I also don't use a microwave to cook meals in. Just to warm things up. I like the ease of use. Press 1-5 and the minutes automatically start. You CAN turn the beep down or off. It is just perfect for what I use it for. Not a loud sound when on. It was a good purchase for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good, Small, Works!
reviews.reviewText: Needed an inexpensive replacement for a small kitchen and this fit the bill. Our previous microwave's door latch broke, and although it still worked fine, we couldn't use it because we couldn't get the door open! Such a waste. I bought this one because there is no latch. Just pull to open. Has all the features typical of a basic microwave oven - spinning, glass table, one-push 30 sec button, various pre-set buttons, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product arrived damaged
reviews.reviewText: Can't rate it since I really did not use it due to the product arricing dented. It looks nice enough and it is great for small kitchens. I am giving it 3 stars and 5 stars for small places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tough little customer
reviews.reviewText: Our kitchen is being remodeled and currently torn down to the studs. We set up a makeshift kitchen in a spare bedroom and bought this microwave and a couple other small appliances to get us by. this microwave is powerful for size, great for making breakfast, heating up tea or coffee, and can actually handle larger bowls and plates, it’s been a great little microwave for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lo amo, es hermoso y Perfecto .
reviews.reviewText: Perfecto para espacios pequeños , look vintage y color Perfecto 👌🏻.Altamente recomendado .

reviews.reviewerName: Yudsli lilian zavala cortezYudsli lilian zavala cortez
reviews.reviewText: Es muy bonito , pero me llego chueco ! Nose si esta mal hecho o esta golpeado , pero creo esta mal hecho
Es de buen tamaño, está hermoso, el color muy bonito y el diseño, funciona muy bien, espero que dure mucho tiempo.

A pesar de que en la descripción el color dice "verde" en las fotos el horno se ve azul pastel/cielo e incluso en los comentarios de compradores de EEUU se menciona que es azul. Pues no es azul, realmente es VERDE MENTA. Tuve que devolverlo solo por ese detalle, ojalá usaran fotos más exactas a lo que se recibe físicamente. Respecto a funcionalidad no tengo opinión porque nunca lo usé pero fuera del color el horno es muy bonito.
